tasks.title: Backend: Notification Models & Core Service
tasks.description: Create database models for notifications and the core service to manage them.
tasks.codingPrompt: Create `Notification` model (user_id, title, message, is_read, type). Implement `NotificationService` with formatting create/get/mark_read methods.

tasks.title: Backend: Email Integration
tasks.description: Implement email sending logic using SMTP or Mock for dev environment.
tasks.codingPrompt: Create `EmailService`. Implement `send_email` using `fastapi-mail` or standard `smtplib`. Create a base HTML template for emails.

tasks.title: Frontend: Notification Center UI
tasks.description: Detailed UI for viewing and managing notifications.
tasks.codingPrompt: Create `NotificationCenter` component using a Popover. Display unread count badge. List notifications with read/unread status. Implement `markAsRead` mutation.
